Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Have you had enough?

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy1
Dialogue.Text: You!!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy1
Dialogue.Text: You haven't heard the last of me!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy1
Dialogue.Text: My brother Steven will not take kindly to the slings and arrows you accosted my family honor with!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Begone then!!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Trouble us no longer with your foul presence

Dialogue.Speaker: barmaid
Dialogue.Text: You didn't have to do that, really

Dialogue.Speaker: barmaid
Dialogue.Text: What do I call you?

Dialogue.Speaker: barmaid
Dialogue.Text: My hero?

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: I am known as Jacque.

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Jacque Blaque.

Dialogue.Speaker: barmaid
Dialogue.Text: He and his family are quite wealthy in these lands.

Dialogue.Speaker: barmaid
Dialogue.Text: You might have just bought yourself more trouble than my honor is worth!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: It would be all made worth it, for a pint of your finest ale.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: You drink, and try to enjoy the evening in a tavern that strikes you as quite foreign.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: After a pint or two however a new challenger arrives, looking to sooth his wounded family honor....
BANG!!!

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: ...A stranger kicks the door open...

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: ...Glares around the tavern...

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: Who is the one who gave my bother a tongue lashing tonight?

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: ...Glares around the tavern...

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: ...Locks eyes with Jacque..

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Ah, your brother must be that ill mannered drunkard.

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: I hope my vicious verses left him tending the wounds to his ego!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: He sure left in a hurry!

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: ...The patrons of the bar laugh...

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: On my families honor, this will not stand!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: You think my brother a fool?!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: I will show you how vicious my verses can be!!
